nodes.text: Wom-Nii Gnaden was a male Jedi Master who was serving as a general in the Galactic Republic's Grand Army sometime during or after 22 BBY, during the Clone Wars. A skilled pilot, Gnaden fought in the Battle of Crombach Nebula sometime between 22 and 19 BBY. During that encounter, his NTB-630 naval bomber was damaged and spun out of control, crashing into the hull of a Separatist Munificent-class star frigate called the Tide of Progress XII. The crash killed Gnaden and left damage still visible at the time of the Battle of Coruscant in 19 BBY.
Wom-Nii Gnaden was first mentioned in Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith Incredible Cross-Sections, a 2005 reference book written by Curtis Saxton.
